info.title: Get My Miiverse Token!
info.author: not Yoshiomi KURISU
info.description: Gets Miiverse auth data for PC usage
info.details:
Do not download/use if you dont know what this is for, please.

Gets Miiverse auth data like your X-Nintendo-ServiceToken, and X-Nintendo-ParamPack so you can access your Miiverse instance outside the Wii U!

For more information, check the github page:

https://github.com/dwyazzo90/GetMyMiiverseToken
